item.title: Punk playlist for 9/2017
item.description: Including: Against Me!, Agent Orange, Days N' Daze, Gogol Bordello, Husker Du, Joan Jett, Minor Threat, Neutral Milk Hotel, Propagandhi, The Crowd.

item.description: Including: Bad Religion, Dead Kennedys, Descendents, Fall Back Down, Fear, Leftöver Crack, Propagandhi, Take Warning, The Germs, The Offspring.

item.description: Including: Adolescents, Anti-Flag, Bad Religion, Black Flag, Comeback Kid, Dead Kennedys, Descendents, Stiff Little Fingers, Teenage Bottlerocket, The Distillers.
